article_title: U.S. Rep. Keating, GOP challenger Chapman to participate in three debates next week

article_metadata.description:
With the Nov. 4 election less than two weeks away, incumbent Democrat U.S. Rep. William Keating, of Massachusetts’ 9th Congressional District, will square off next week in three debates against his Republican challenger, John Chapman.
The first debate will be broadcast via radio next Monday on WATD 95.9 FM, out of Marshfield. The hourlong in-studio debate will start at 6:20 p.m., said Christine James, managing editor of WATD’s news department.
The second debate will take place at
article_metadata.author: Michael Gagne

og.site_name: The Herald News, Fall River, MA
